title: News Caster
summary: News Caster: Global News Now Application
developerAddress: Lonak Business Center, Kasarani - Nairobi, Kenya
description: News Caster is the most comprehensive, feature rich, free news app on Google Play. News Caster gives you the most news on any topic or location of your choice, aggregated via Google News! News Caster has many advanced features such as summarization, reader mode, offline reading and translation that take the Google News experience to the next level. Now you can also read a summary, save, share .News Caster is a worthy replacement of the stock News and Weather app.News Caster is a news app designed for avid news readers who want the latest news on their fingertips. Whether you are sitting down comfortably to read, or on-the-go, or even sleeping, News Caster is there for you! Designed around the concept of channels (topics) rather than individual sources, News Caster currently has more than 100 preconfigured channels (top news, business, technology, sports, etc.,) aggregating thousands of sources via Google News.News Caster also includes Google News Regional Editions for many countries, custom channels for any keyword, and even local news for any state, city or zip code. News Caster is optimized for both phones and tablets (especially 7" and 10" tablets like Nexus 7 and Nexus 10), with a list layout for phones and optional grid and tile layouts for Key Features: Business News,Global Market,Sports ,Social and Cultural news
descriptionHTML:
News Caster is the most comprehensive, feature rich, free news app on Google Play. News Caster gives you the most news on any topic or location of your choice, aggregated via Google News! News Caster has many advanced features such as summarization, reader mode, offline reading and translation that take the Google News experience to the next level. Now you can also read a summary, save, share .News Caster is a worthy replacement of the stock News and Weather app.
News Caster is a news app designed for avid news readers who want the latest news on their fingertips. Whether you are sitting down comfortably to read, or on-the-go, or even sleeping, News Caster is there for you! Designed around the concept of channels (topics) rather than individual sources, News Caster currently has more than 100 preconfigured channels (top news, business, technology, sports, etc.,) aggregating thousands of sources via Google News.
News Caster also includes Google News Regional Editions for many countries, custom channels for any keyword, and even local news for any state, city or zip code. News Caster is optimized for both phones and tablets (especially 7" and 10" tablets like Nexus 7 and Nexus 10), with a list layout for phones and optional grid and tile layouts for
Key Features:
Business News,Global Market,Sports ,Social and Cultural news
